scripts.build-mac-binaries: npm run qmake && npm run make && npm run macdeploy
scripts.clean-leftovers: npm run make-clean&& rm -f 'Video simili duplicate cleaner.dmg' && rm -f Makefile && rm -f .qmake.stash && rm -f -r 'Video simili duplicate cleaner.app'
scripts.clean: npm run make-clean && npm run clean-leftovers
